original: Naakusalaṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca naabyākataṁ naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: na akusalam na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam ca na abyākatam na adukkham asukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca naakusalaṁ naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: na kusalam na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam ca na akusalam na adukkham asukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa sabbattha vitthāro
